features: Plug and Play: No Bluetooth, No APP, No adapter needed. Just plug the receiver into your devices and turn on the power switch of the transmitters, the two parts will get connected successfully and auto paired immediately. Note: If the matching is unsuccessful, don't worry, just turn off the device and try again.

Omnidirectional Mic with Noise Reduction: The built-in intelligent active noise reduction chip allows you to record clearly in noisy environments, which can provides more vivid, soft, natural and stereo sound around for recording or real time video.

65FT Transmission & Rechargeable : This lavaier mic has a stable audio signal, the longest wireless transmission distance can reach 65FT and the high-quality DSP chip can bring more stable transmission. Wireless microphone transmitter has built-in rechargeable battery with working time up to 6 hours.

Easy to use: The microphone is completely free from the shackles of wire, allowing you to complete motion shooting, mobile phone recording, and short video production in various large scenes. Clip microphone, you can just clip the microphone on your shirt to free your hand and recording at a remote distance. Helps you get rid of messy wire and clearly recording or taking video at a further distance indoors or outdoors

Full Compatibility: Compatible with iOS Devices. The wireless lav mic can work iOS system and can be use with iPhone and iPad. Without usb c type interface connected to your mobile phone, it can not be used with android devices
What You Get: 1 TX (1 Transmitters) + 1 RX(1 Receiver ) + 2 Charging cable+Instruction. Our worry-free 12-month warranty, and friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Reverb Mode 2 Noise Reduction 3 Long Rang Transmission

Why is there no sound when I record? 1. Please check whether the TX and RX are paired successfully 2. Please check whether the receiver is fully inserted into the phone. If the phone case blocks the interface, please remove it and try again 3. Please check whether it is in silent mode How to pair the transmitter with the receiver of a lavalier microphone? Turn on the transmitter then plug the receiver into your device, the transmitter and receiver will connect automatically. How can I mute while recording? Press the button on the transmitter to enter mute mode and the indicator light will flash green. Press again and resume recording. NOTE: After receiving the product, please charge the transmitter first. The transmitter's battery may become dead in storage. Please charge the transmitter before using it for the first time. If you have any questions, please feel free to let me know via your order page

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love these
reviews.reviewText: Microphones are a hit with my kids! Easy to use and great sound quality, they add fun to our family activities. Highly recommended for hassle-free and enjoyable microphone use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Price is good
reviews.reviewText: They work super well and are very easy to use. It's perfect for what you pay for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works, but it sucks
reviews.reviewText: Like the title says. It works but it kinda sucks. Like if you need to record dialogue maybe not but if it’s an interview type thing then it’s okay if you get me.It’s worth it for the price though. Super light weight and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for vlogging
reviews.reviewText: I use them for YouTube videos and they work great just dont drop them I dropped mine on concrete and they stopped working but I charged them after that and they work again so they do work stillI would recommend these definitely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars These WERE great....WERE....
reviews.reviewText: I loved this mic for the few months it worked. The sound WAS great and it WAS easy to use. I bought it in July. This past week (January) I plugged it into my iPhone and noticed after I'd done some recording that it didn't work. I looked for troubleshooting info on the sorry excuse for an instruction book that came with it and for ways to contact the company but of course that doesn't exist these days for cheap junk from overseas. Both of the mics and the part you plug into the phone has been kept in the original box so it's been protected from damage....no reason it shouldn't work. So anyway, I unplugged it from my phone and it turned right on when I plugged it into my iPad, but that's not what I use to record video since it's so much better on my phone. I tried plugging it into my phone again and after some wiggling, I got the little green light to come on on the part you plug into the phone, but it still doesn't record any sound. So since there are no helpful humans to talk to, I guess I'm stuck with a cool microphone shaped paperweight. So so so disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: Amazing microphone works well. When relistining to audio for video ensure volume is up on phone, not low. Easy to use plug the brick to phone turn on microphone and ready to record audio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good but not good at the same time
reviews.reviewText: You can go far for the camera but u can’t shake the mic and it sounds weird when u do shake it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needed a phone mic for making reels and shorts
reviews.reviewText: I am a sound guy and I have a lot of audio gear. I wanted something that would allow me to have studio quality sound with me all the time. This is great. The lapel mic charges on my USB and the phone receiver plugs into my iPhone. It is quick and easy and I have great sound. I got a great little selfie stick tripod thing and it is like having a video production studio in my bag. I have only had it a few days so I can't speak to longevity, but for this price if I break it (or more likely lose it) I will just get a new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Does what it says on the tin. It’s not perfect sound, but how can you expect it to be? For people looking for something to start out with, this is perfect, and a fraction of the price of a professional mic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that it's a good value for the price paid. Always ensure you charge after every use though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The ratio price and quality is really good. I’m happy with the sound

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not very good, can hardly hear me and picks up too much static when moving just a slight bit
